data_description.host: The hostname or IP address of your Foscam camera.
data_description.password: The password to login to your Foscam camera.
data_description.port: The port of your Foscam camera, default is 88.
data_description.rtsp_port: The RTSP protocol port of the camera, used to pull the camera's real-time video stream. New model cameras only support RTSP ports 88 and 554, while old model cameras only support ports 88 and 65534.
data_description.stream: Select the video stream type to pull. The main stream offers higher clarity but requires a better network environment.
data_description.username: The username to login to your Foscam camera.

ptz.description: Moves a Foscam camera to a specified direction.
ptz.name: PTZ

ptz_preset.description: Moves a Foscam camera to a predefined position.

preset_name.description: The name of the preset to move to. Presets can be created from within the official Foscam apps.
preset_name.name: Preset name

ptz_preset.name: PTZ preset
